ItemTooltips.blink: Best snowball item, get this if you have a lot of kills. It's also good if you're your team's main initiator.
ItemTooltips.gem: Versus invisibile Heroes like Bounty Hunter, Nyx Assassin or Clinkz. Give it to your mid/solo.
ItemTooltips.cloak: When the enemies have a lot of magical damage (e.g. Queen of Pain, Zeus).
ItemTooltips.flask: Sometimes you might want two Iron Branches instead of this.
ItemTooltips.dust: Versus invisibile Heroes like Bounty Hunter, Nyx Assassin or Clinkz.
ItemTooltips.courier: Get Sentries + Smoke if your team already has Observers and Courier.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: When all your tier 1 and tier 2 towers are down and your team is doing great.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: When you need auras for your team, or simply want extra sustainability vs Roshan. Get this with 2-3 melees in your team.
ItemTooltips.pipe: For when you're versus a Zeus or Queen of Pain (or any other nuker).
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Pick this up if you're roaming or just need more HP.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: If you need to stop a hard carry like Faceless Void or Luna.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: If your team has a spell that needs a setup, e.g. Split Earth or Sacred Arrow.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: When you need mobility even for teammates, e.g. vs Furion or Clockwerk.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: When you need to push, and quickly! Build it up until Necro 3. Best used with Furion, Pugna and/or Shadow Shaman.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Extra defense and teamfight auras: get this if the enemies are too strong in teamfights.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: When you need stats and auras for your team, always a good choice.
ItemTooltips.medallion_of_courage: Pick this up if your team needs to fight Roshan early on.
ItemTooltips.smoke_of_deceit: When you want to gank. Always buy it if you have a good support partner like Leshrac or Lina and go gank mid!
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: When you have a lot of gold and want a secondary pseudo-purge. The extra HP is also cheap and good.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: Get these if you can get kills roaming around the map.
